rawContent:
We aren't calling you a groomer because you're gay or trans. We call you a groomer because you want porn in schools, to show kids sexually inappropriate shows, to talk to kids about subjects that aren't appropriate for them, and to make it all about you and your sexuality in the hopes that these kids will "open up" or become like you.

That's grooming.

As a group of LGB&T people, we know that there are people out there who want to condemn us, who want to call us "groomers" and everything else. We get a lot of abuse as well. A lot of "well they've used the exact wording against gays before." We're just trying to protect the kids.
